title: News24.com | Hunt is on for members of a religious gathering which became a 'coronavirus hotspot' in India
description: A large religious gathering in New Delhi has sparked a manhunt across India for suspected coronavirus cases after being linked to dozens of infections and several deaths.
content:
A large religious gathering in New Delhi has sparked a manhunt across India for suspected coronavirus cases after being linked to dozens of infections and several deaths.
The gathering emerged as one of India's major virus hotspots after thousands flocked to… [+2361 chars]
